name: Altudo
description: Altudo specializes in enhancing customer experience through personalized engagement, leveraging its expertise as a Sitecore Platinum partner. With a team of over 500 professionals across 9 locations and numerous certifications, including 8 Sitecore MVPs, Altudo has completed 2000+ projects for 200+ clients, including 45 Fortune 500 companies. Their focus spans CX strategy, marketing automation, and data analytics to drive significant ROI for clients through their MarTech solutions.

enhanced_description: Altudo is a global digital transformation and CX (Customer Experience) agency that leverages its deep expertise in personalized engagement, marketing automation, and data analytics to deliver significant ROI for clients. As a Sitecore Platinum partner with a team of over 500 professionals, 8 Sitecore MVPs, and operations across 9 global locations, Altudo has successfully completed more than 2000 projects for over 200 clients, including 45 Fortune 500 companies. While their core strength lies in transforming digital ecosystems and optimizing customer touchpoints through MarTech solutions, their services are also applied to HR technology challenges. Altudo aims to help enterprises in talent acquisition by leveraging AI and machine learning to drive efficiency, boost hiring manager confidence, and reduce the cost of hiring qualified employees through data-driven and automated approaches.
